verses.1: Topa ka Pasian aw, nangmah kong bel hi. Kei hong delhteʼ kiang panin hong dal inla hong hon in.
verses.2: Kei hong hon kei lecin a hong hon ding dang kuamah om lo ahih manin amaute in humpinelkai bangin hong kai khia-in hong bal gawp ding uh hi.
verses.3: Topa ka Pasian aw, ka gamtat a siat a, ka khut a khialh leh,
verses.4: bangmah thu om lopi-in ka lawmte khemin, ka galte ka huh taak leh,
verses.5: galte in kei hong delhin hong pha uh henla, leilak ah kei hong tuancilsak inla, leilak ah kei hong sial pai ta uh hen.
verses.6: Tho in, Topa, a hehsa-in thasaan inla, ka galteʼ hehna panin kei hong dal in. Khanglo in, ka Pasian aw, thukhen nading hun khat na seh khinzo hi.
verses.7: Nangma omna kiimah mite kikhawmsak inla, amauteʼ omna tung a sangna munah tu in.
verses.8: Topa in mite thu a khen hi. Topa aw, ka thumanna le keima sunga om ka dikna tawh kizui-in thu hong khen in.
verses.9: Lungsim le ngaihsutna a en a thuman Pasian aw, migiloteʼ siatna beisak inla, mi thumante kipsak in.
verses.10: Pasian, kei hong hupa hi a, lungsim man mite a hon hi.
verses.11: Pasian, thu a tangin a khen pa hi a, migilote tungah a heh den pa ahi hi.
verses.12: Mite a kibawl phatkik kei leh, Pasian in a thalkhau hek zo a, a namsau taat ding hi.
verses.13: Amah in mei thaltang bawl a, sih theihna ama galhiamte a baih sa-in a koih zo hi.
verses.14: Migilo in thusia paii a, suak nuamin na a, zuau thu a hing khia hi.
verses.15: Amah in gum to a, ama tawh sa gum sung mahah amah a kia hi.
verses.16: Ama lunggulh hoih lo pen ama lu tungah tukik a, ama gamtat sia pen ama luzang mahah tukik hi.
verses.17: Keʼn ahihleh, ama dikna om bangin Topaʼ tungah lungdamna ka lak dinga, a Sangpen Topaʼ minphatna la ka sak ding hi.
